author: mathieu.bridon@uperto.com
msg: ISSUE 358 / 372: Current number of participants in a room.
Room id was not set properly when entering a room, which made the check for the number of users in a room fail.

author: mathieu.bridon@uperto.com
msg: Complete rewrite of the hyphenation algorithm. Sould now be faster, and should not freeze on too long phrases.
